00005 class TwoAtomPotential(TwoAtomInteraction):
00006     '''representation of a two atom potential for gulp'''
00007     class Inventory(Component.Inventory):
00008         import pyre.inventory as inv
00009         interIntra = inv.str( "Molecularity", default = None)
00010         interIntra.meta['tip'] = "whether the potential is molecular and if so, whether it is between or within molecules"
00011         interIntra.validator = inv.choice([None,'intermolecular','intramolecular'])
00012         bondXsO = inv.str( "Bonded Atom Interactions", default = None)
00013         bondXsO.meta['tip'] = "how the potential acts among bonded atoms"
00014         bondXsO.validator = inv.choice([None,
00015                     'only between bonded atoms',
00016                     'not between bonded atoms',
00017                     'not between bonded atoms or atoms separated by two bonds',
00018                     'only between atoms separated by three bonds'])
00019         scale14 = inv.str( "Scaling Options", default = None)
00020         scale14.meta['tip'] = "whether to scale certain potentials"
00021         scale14.validator = inv.choice([None,'scale interactions between atoms separated by three bonds'])
00022         atom1 = inv.str('Atom 1',default='H')
00023         atom1.meta['tip'] = 'chemical species of atom 1'
00024         atom1.meta['importance'] = 10
00025         atom2 = inv.str('Atom 2',default='H')
00026         atom2.meta['tip'] = 'chemical species of atom 2'  
00027         atom2.meta['importance'] = 10     
00028         atom1Type = inv.str( "Atom 1 Type", default = None)
00029         atom1Type.meta['tip'] = "type of atom 1"
00030         atom1Type.validator = inv.choice([None, 'core','shell'])
00031         atom1Type.meta['importance'] = 5
00032         atom2Type = inv.str( "Atom 2 Type", default = None)
00033         atom2Type.meta['tip'] = "type of atom 2"
00034         atom2Type.validator = inv.choice([None, 'core','shell'])
00035         atom2Type.meta['importance'] = 5

00037     def __init__(self, atom1, atom2):
00038         TwoAtomInteraction.__init__(self, atom1, atom2)
00039         self.ii = self.inventory
00040         # initialize the atom types if the potential contains any
00041         
00042     def assignInteraction(self, name):
00043         self.potentialpotential = self.info[name]
00044         self.namename = name
00045         if self.potentialpotential.has_key('atom1Type') and self.potentialpotential.has_key('atom2Type'):
00046             self.ii.atom1Type = self.potentialpotential['atom1Type']
00047             self.ii.atom2Type = self.potentialpotential['atom2Type']
00048     
00049     def getAssignedInteraction(self):
00050         return self.potentialpotential
00051             
00052     def getIfDefined(self, inventoryItem):
00053         if inventoryItem==None:
00054             return ''
00055         else:
00056             return inventoryItem
00057         
00058     def getIfDefinedSpace(self, inventoryItem):
00059         if inventoryItem==None:
00060             return ''
00061         else:
00062             return inventoryItem+' '
00063         
00064     def getFlag(self, flagItem):
00065         if flagItem==None:
00066             return ''
00067         else:
00068             if flagItem:
00069                 return '1 '
00070             else:
00071                 return '0 '
00072             
00073     def writeBonding(self):
00074         '''writes bonding options'''
00075         if self.ii.bondXsO==None:
00076             return ''
00077         elif self.ii.bondXs0=='only between bonded atoms':
00078             return 'bond '
00079         elif self.ii.bondXs0=='not between bonded atoms':
00080             return 'x12 '
00081         elif self.ii.bondXs0=='not between bonded atoms or atoms separated by two bonds':
00082             return 'x13 '
00083         elif self.ii.bondXs0=='only between atoms separated by three bonds':
00084             return 'o14 '       
00085             
00086     def writeInterIntra(self):
00087         '''writes molecularity options'''
00088         if self.ii.interIntra==None:
00089             return ''
00090         elif self.ii.interIntra=='intermolecular':
00091             return 'inter '
00092         elif self.ii.interIntra=='intramolecular':
00093             return 'intra '
00094         
00095     def writeScaling(self):
00096         '''writes scaling options'''  
00097         if self.ii.scale14==None:
00098             return ''
00099         elif self.ii.scale14==None:
